message: Please help us with the thieves at Delmas 10, they live in #10
original: TANPRI EDE NOU AK VOLE NAN DELMA 10 vole yo rete nan # 10 la

message: i need 100 gourdes because i need to call my family that is in the countryside right now. i don't have news from them
original: Mwen bezwen 100 gouds kat voyel pnu mwen paske mwen bezwen rele fanmi mwen ki an pwovens. koulye a. paske mwen pa pran nouvel yo. yo tre ky de mwen koulyea

original: Nou se you group viktim nou bezwen ed tankou prela tant manje dlo. Nou nan gresye gare du sud

original: Nou pa gen pwoblem sa yo, se pwoblem manje nou genyen.

original: Svp branche telefon sa sou entnt pou mwen pou m ka chat avek nou paske kontra entnt mwen fini

original: Sim pa jouin mange ak kisa poum bay ti moun tete poum mete jif nan dlo fok mouin te ginyel.

original: Comment dois je rentre en france parce que je suis bloque en haiti, reponse.

message: We have a problem with the food that is given to us. We are not use to eat this kind of food and we are scared to eat it. Also, before eating it we have to check the expiration date.
original: Nou gen yon gwo pwoblem ak manje tou pare yo nou pa abitye ak yo e y ap fe nou pa yo li y ap mande an van n manje fok gade dat ekspirasyon. JovenevFELIX

message: I would like to know if the president is not right in his mind. All the schools have collapsed and the government is talking about school.
original: Mwen ta ren men kon nen eske presidan an pa byen nan tet paske tout lekol kraze menm ministe a epi yo ap pale de lekol.

original: Men gen an pil moun nan kwadbouk rue fort dargout se nan miz nou ye menm an yen yo papote pou nou gen an pil manman avek ti moun piti li yo pote manje

message: They are camped on the square, my mother is inside where we can't enter. (We) have no work, the children are crying, (please) pass the word along so that I can learn whether this message has reached (the right people) so that we can (get help).
original: se sou plas la yo rete man m an n dan b kote nou yopa an tre pa gen travay ti moun ap kriye di yon mo pou nou fe m konnen si mesaj la rive pou nou ka g

message: we are now in petit goave #55 benoit street. we have problems to get shelter health services and food. please help us by the grace of god
original: Nous sommes maintenant du cote de Petit-Goave, # 55, Rue Benoit, nous avons des difficults par exemple logement, sante, famine. Nous vous prions en grace

message: I have heard from everyone. Now we are all in need of food., We are in Jacmel Rue Axina Giles
original: M pran nouvel tout moun mwen yo la mesi bon die kounie ya mwen menm ak moun na katie a grangou se jakmel ru axina giles

message: The people on the ground right now in Haiti are not helping out at all in my area.
original: zwen. moun kap bay ed yo pa voye je ditou b isit la. lm al promennen gade kif mwen w tout zon andikape sayo

message: help us because we don't have anything to function with, its true we need advice to protect ourselves and if we protect those who need help around us in these times ( truncated )
original: ede nou paske nou pa gen anyen pou nou fonksyone. se vre nou bezwen konsey pou nou ka pwoteje tet nou e pwoteje sila yo ki antoure nou yo. nan moman sa, s

original: GRANGOU AP FIN TOUYE NOU FOK NOU FE YON BAGAY POU NOU NAN ZON LAKIL, LEYOGAN.

message: you will never get hurt or annoyed in distribution of food in cite soleil
original: moun pa janm vinn blese ak indispoze nan distribisyon manje nan cite soley

message: My family is in Delmas 14 and needs some aid. They need food, water, and shelter. My cousin has an infant who needs baby food.
original: My family in Delmas 14 need some aid. They need food, water, and shelter. My cousin has an infant and need some baby food.

message: please who are you? i want to pass the message for you i am a public health employee and i have a megaphone
original: Svp dim kiles ouye? poum ka pase mesaj la pibyen pounou mwen seyon anplay sante publik em gen megafnn.

message: what you are saying is really important. for me it is hunger that is killing me and you never speak of this
original: Sa nap di yo vrman enpotan, men se grangou kap touyem tou, nou pa janm pale de sa.

message: We are almost dead at Impasse Mousin ( mouzen ) off Rue Lamarre, we never have received anything. Please.
original: Nou prske mouri nan enpas mouzen ru lama, nou pa janm jwenn anyen. Svp

original: AL NAP MANDE MINIST A KOMAN LAP EDE NOU JOUEN MEDIKAMAN POU DO

original: 4636 : Exp sante yo si pitit ou gen pi piti ke si mwa, kontinye ba li tete tout tan ou kapab pou ou ka ramplase fluid li pedi yo

original: Madanm mwen ansent 6 mwa ki prevansyon kpab pran

original: E ed la menm mwen pap jwenn li

original: Cuales su respuesta al sujeto de mi pedida. Por favor

original: MWEN PA KO JANM JWENN ENFORMASYON SOU SA KE PRESIDAN TE SYEN SAMDI

original: Bonsoir, comment vous vous sentiez, la chose qui nous poussaient, nous avons jamais recu de nourritures, ou nous abitons et que vous avez nous promise a la

original: radio, en efet nous comptons sur votre aide merci.

message: these things i already know but thank you anyway. i am in cite militaire we haven't got
original: bagay sa mwen konnen yo deja mwesi kanmem men se anyan menm nan site milite nou pa jwen

message: In waney further up the Corosol creek, there is someone trappeed under their collapsed home
original: Nan waney anro souce korosol gen yon moun anba dekonb t

message: MBE. WE ARE ALMOST WITHOUT WATER TO DRINK. PLEASE STOP BY ON RUE SAINTILUS ( SAINTILUS STREET ) OK
original: mbe. Nou prske pa gen dlo poun bw. Mezanmi fe yon ti pase nan mje rue saintilus. Ok

original: Svp. Mete yon kat pou mwen poum ka fe yon apel entenasyonnal.

original: Bonsoir, comment dois je rentre en france parce que je suis bloque en haiti, reponse

message: You do not need to send me anymore messages
original: Nou pabezyen voye mesaj pou mwen anko

original: cmt pourrrions-ns sortir ds cette situation?

original: Mwen gen problem menm manje mwen paka manje nou paka vin bay manje nan kafoufey

original: Bonjou koman nou ye eske nou pa bay d nan kwadbouk sitou kote mwen ye a nan Latremblay paske nou bezwen. mesi

original: Si mwen miragwan ak lagonav ki frekans BBC

original: Mesi anpil pou tout enfomasyon sa yo. .. !

original: Pou kisa se radyo sa menm pou mwen kou te et mwen ta renmen konnen pou kisa

message: Can you please stop sending me messages.

original: Nou pa gen moustik pou timounn yo e yo pa pote pou nou.

original: Souple fe nous jouin de trois tante svp tampri.

original: mwen voye sms nan nimewo sa a pou manje dlo tante mwen pa jam jwenn repons mwen delma 75 piblen aveni jode ri katrinn flon nou anviwon 200 fanmi mesi

original: F yon ti transf manje pou mwen m ap mouri grangou.

original: Mesye ou madam mwen grangou mwen pa menm kakanpe sitlman mwen grangou si nou tap vin separe manje a latap byen bon pou popilasyon a mesi

original: Yonswa mwen bezwen konsey sou kouman poum proteje tet mwen kont epidemi ak evantyl tranbleman.

original: tout. Ong fmen pou malere. tankou food for the poor. unicef e latr

original: Hi, we ask to us a alimentary and financiary help because we need it speedly we are starvy, nou ta renmen si posib pou nou ta voye yon lot nimewo pou kan

original: syon nou yo. katastwof 12 janvye a rive kraze sis kay ak 50 ki sibi gwo domaj, kote gen anpil moun ki kite kapital potoprens ki vi ateri nan zon nan, lafyv

original: Si 1moun bezwen ed manje ak dlo trete ki kote poul ale. svp mesi

original: Di esp yo pou mwen pa gen dlo pa gen kay, tant

original: Mwen pa gen moutik ki sa pou mwen f?

original: bnn, you bon madanm et li bl li mouri, pdt li nan you sevis, kay fr zakari alliance, li kite 4 timoun nan men mwen, se li ki tap travay, mwen lague

original: Mesi, nou voye twp konsey pou mwen. Se manje m bezwen kounya.

message: water please. Thank you. God bless you.

original: Nou salye nou nan non jezi nou gen pwoblem paske b kote nou gen moun ki f k. tansyon asmatik. nou pa gen tant nou pa gen dlo potab. gen moun ki ipo e ip

original: C leogane tremblement de terre la plus kraze, nou nan la rue nou besoin tente poun dormi.

original: Mwen ta renmen konnen ki wl MINUSTAH nan peyi a?

original: Je suis un escape au gonaives je besoin aides. aide-moi

original: Nou menm moun Gwo Mon Atibonit nou bezwen swen paske yo pa voye. Voye medsen pou n

original: Kisa pou moun gwo min yo f konsnan kriz sa.

original: Komin site soley bezwen ed tankou dlo, manje ak tant mesi

original: Adres : lakil Petigwav # 1, Objektif : demand d manje, kote pou n demi. Silvoupl nap mande n pou n pran ka nou ankonsekan paske nou pa kap ank, tout tib

original: agay nou te gen yen pou n manje fini. Nou nenpt 240 moun.

original: Mwen tepanse le nou tebay nimewo a se yon afserye padan setan jodi a f 15 jou nou paka jwenn anwyen

original: Bonswa nou leyogan sou wout 9 nou manke dlo pou nou bw tanpri ede nou

original: sa ki pi esansyal pou mwen se : tant, manje, antibiotik, dlo. mesi davans pou patisipasyon nou. mwen gen 5 moun kap viv lakay mwen.

original: bite rout de nazon impas rouzier yo de pi madi 12 yo pa pote anyen pou nou merci reponse RODNEY

original: Aider nous le plus vite que possible parceque la commune de gressier ( mariani ) est la plus mepriser nous vous attendons merci de tout coeur

original: bonjour! mwen abite lamentin 54 route rail zone labellejunette hotel gen anpil moun kap domi nan lari pa gen dlo pa gen manje pa gen medikaman silvouple

original: Un front froid se retrouve sur Cuba ce matin. Il pourrait traverser Haiti demain. Des averses de pluie isolee sont encore prevues sur notre region ce soi

message: We are in Clercine 4, requesting assistance in the shape of 2-3 tents
original: Nou menm nan clercine 4 eske nou ka jwenn yon ti d pa eksanp nou ap demi nan seren eske nou pap ka jwenn de twa tant

message: Requesting water. Home collapsed on Solino ( ground. )
original: alo mwen pa gen dlo. man, kay mwen kraze se sou teren solino map domi silvou ple edem bo dieu ua remet ou sa mesi.

message: Requesting council in regards to shock treatment
original: Mwen bezwen yon konsey de sesisman

message: We are in Clercine 4. The T?koa Adventist church is our location.
original: Nan Clercine 4 glise Adventiste de Tkoa se la nou lokalize nou. Merci

message: Even that our father has died, we want to become professionals in all kind of fields of study. Help us find adequate shelter in other for the children to go to school. Best regards and may God bless you.

original: Mwen mande ak otorite yo pandan yap bay tant pou lekol yo pou yo pa bliye lekol la Gonav yo nan tant yap bay yo paske yo fisire nou f elv yo antre lad

original: an yo konsa mesi se fondat kolj Jrusalem la Gonav. konsa nou itilize l kom sant pou moun yo demi nou bezwen ed pou moun sa yo tou.
